title: 05/13/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/13/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the 2021 NFL Schedule Release. Which city will Tom Brady play in this season for the first time in career? Former NFL Lineman and future HoFer Joe Thomas joined us to discuss what Baker Mayfield will need to do this season to ensure that he get gets a contract extension. And ESPN's Mina Kimes tells us which teams Head Coach could be on the hot seat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
